stories.text: It seems like most of their revenue comes from support because their software is open source. It's a challenge to increase the margins from support because the more people pay for support, the more people HashiCorp needs to employ. How they will be able to grow financially?
stories.title: What do you think about HashiCorp's business model?

stories.text: I want to understand the real use cases of using a multi/hybrid cloud infra as opposed to handling everything in one cloud.
stories.title: Do you use MULTI-CLOUD or HYBRID-CLOUD infra?
